JamPlus Modules

Introduction

JamPlus comes with a number of helper modules, above and beyond the capabilities in the Jambase. (In fact, some of those features should probably move into a Jam module.) The modules are .jam files that exist in a jammodules/ directory next to the Jam executable.

Modules are loaded using the rule IncludeModule.

List of Jam Modules

The following represents the list of provided Jam modules:

  • CopyDirectory - Copies the file contents of a source directory to a destination directory.
  • CopyFile - Copies a single file.
  • CSharp - Various rules to build C# applications and assemblies.
  • DirectX - DirectX SDK settings.
  • DotNet - Some .NET helper rules, primarily for C++/CLI applications.
  • MFC - MFC settings.
  • Midl - Support for compiling .idl files.
  • wxWidgets - wxWidgets settings.
